_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The Absorptions [sn16.9:15.2]: Dimension of neither perception nor non-perception
Psychic Powers (a causal sequence) [sn16: Multiplying oneself and becoming one again
Going unimpeded through a wall, a rampart, or a mountain as if through space
Diving in and out of the earth as if it were water
Walking on water as if it were earth
Flying cross-legged through the sky like a bird
Touching and stroking with the hand the sun and moon
Controlling the body as far as the BrahmƒÅ realm
Clairaudience and Mind Reading [sn16.9:1: Hearing both kinds of sounds, human and divine, whether near or far
Understanding the minds of other beings and individuals, having comprehended them with one's mind
Recollection of Past Lives [sn16.9:15.2]: Recollecting one's many kinds of past lives, with features and details
Clairvoyance [sn16.9:15.2]: Seeing sentient beings passing away and being reborn
Understanding how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds
Realization of Freedom [sn16.9:15.2]: Realizing the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
